headline: NYC Subway Map (2025): Simple, Safe & Solo-Traveler Friendly
description: View and download the updated 2025 NYC subway map. A beginner-friendly guide with routes, safety tips, and navigation help for solo travelers.
keywords: NYC subway map, solo travel NYC, NYC transit guide, NYC subway safety, NYC itinerary

hasPart.name: How to Read the NYC Subway Map

step.text: Colors represent subway lines, not boroughs.
Letters and numbers indicate specific services.
Solid dots show local stops; hollow dots show express stops.
White/black circles indicate transfer points between lines.
Uptown means northbound; Downtown means southbound.
Weekend service changes are common—always check the MTA app.

mainEntity.name: Is the NYC subway safe at night for solo travelers?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, with precautions: stay near the conductor’s car, avoid empty cars, and use well-lit exits.

mainEntity.name: How much does a subway ride cost?

acceptedAnswer.text: A single ride is $2.90 with OMNY or MetroCard.

mainEntity.name: Can I use Apple Pay or Google Pay?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, OMNY supports all major contactless payment methods.
Most lines run 24/7, but frequency drops late at night.
